main event: A large luminous mass, resembling a large hole in the sky, was observed in Alpena, Michigan on 7 July 1956.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 15 seconds,The object was thought to resemble a balloon,The observations included circles in and out of clouds,The sighting occurred during cloudy weather,The witness was a 35-year-old housewife.
sighted object: a large luminous mass in the sky
